["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"本仓库为 freexian 公司提供的 Debian 操作系统的扩展长期支持（Extended LTS）软件源。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["每个 Debian 稳定版本都有两年的官方支持期限，然后进入由 Debian LTS Team 支持的至少三年的",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.debian.org/lts/","rel":"nofollow","children":"长期支持（LTS）"}],"期。在这五年中，用户依旧可以使用官方 debian 源、debian-security 源及它们的镜像。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["在 LTS 结束后，对应发行版的软件源会被从 Debian 主源中删除，移动到 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://archive.debian.org","rel":"nofollow","children":"archive.debian.org"}],"，不再获得任何更新，对应的 APT 签名公钥也会过期。Freexian 公司为 Debian 提供付费的",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.freexian.com/lts/extended/","rel":"nofollow","children":"扩展 LTS 支持"}],"服务，主要提供安全更新，也有少量功能更新，通常支持期限可至对应版本发布后十年。这些 ELTS 软件源是可以免费使用的。"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"使用方法","children":"使用方法"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["在使用前，请确保你的",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"系统、架构"}],"都在",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.freexian.com/lts/extended/","rel":"nofollow","children":"受支持的 ELTS 列表"}],"中。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"首先安装 Freexian 的 APT 源密钥："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"wget https://deb.freexian.com/extended-lts/archive-key.gpg -O /tmp/elts-archive-key.gpg
{{sudo}}mv /tmp/elts-archive-key.gpg /etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/freexian-archive-extended-lts.gpg","codeLanguage":"shell"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["此后，",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"删除"}]," ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/apt/sources.list"}]," 中的所有的 Debian 源（可能包括 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"foo"}],", ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"foo-updates"}],", ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"foo-backports"}],", ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"foo-security"}]," 等多个来源，其中 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"foo"}]," 为版本代号），替换为："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/apt/sources.list","menus":[{"title":"Debian 版本","items":[["Debian 8 (jessie)",{"release_name":"jessie"}],["Debian 9 (stretch)",{"release_name":"stretch"}],["Debian 10 (buster)",{"release_name":"buster"}]]},{"title":"使用非自由软件源","items":[["否",{"nonfree":""}],["是",{"nonfree":" non-free"}]]}],"code":"deb {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ {{release_name}} main contrib{{nonfree}}","codeLanguage":"properties"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["提醒：旧版 Debian 如需使用 HTTPS 源，需要安装 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"apt-transport-https"}]," 包，并需要对应更新根证书，否则可能无法访问大多数镜像站。详情可参见 TUNA issues 上的",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/tuna/issues/issues/1342#issuecomment-931412628","rel":"nofollow","children":"相应讨论"}],"。"]}]]}]
